mapper.select: SELECT C.ID AS 'id',S.SERVICE_FUNCTION_ID AS 'url',C.CNAME AS 'cname' ,R.CVALUE AS 'cvalue',R.RID AS 'rowindex' ,C.`DESC` AS 'desc' ,S.SERVICE_CONTENT AS 'content' FROM T_ROW_PTYW_INFO R , T_COLUMN_PTYW_INFO C,T_SERVICE_INFO S WHERE R.ID = #{id} AND S.ID = R.ID AND C.ID = R.ID AND R.CID = C.CID AND R.RID NOT IN( SELECT RID FROM T_ROW_PTYW_INFO WHERE ID = #{id} AND CVALUE = 'FALSE' OR CVALUE = 'false' ) ORDER BY R.RID ASC
